name: Colonel Joe
description:
Summary:

The year is 20XX, the CIA has sent in experimental drug superhuman war hero Colonel Joe, their only hope in infiltrating Asia is to eliminate a private army from the Imperialist nation intentions.

It is up to you Colonel Joe, to stop the army's advance towards Asia's occupation by wielding an array of unique weapons and dodging enemy fire and native wildlife alike. 

Arsenal Do you have what it takes to defeat the Imperialists?
Let's look at your arsenal! There are four weapons:
  • Desert Rat  
  • Stingfire 220 
  • Shotgun  
  • Sword  
Powerups and Pickups Aside from weapons, you have crates you can break!


These can provide you with items such as:
  • Chicken  

    Replenish your health with a lovely whole chicken waiting to be devoured!

  • Ammo Crate  

    Get your bullets with this good old ammo crate!
